name: Insaerndel
visual_summary: A tall, lean Altmer with sharp, handsome features—amber-ember eyes, a neat mustache and goatee, and long raven-black hair spilling in loose waves from beneath a deep violet hood trimmed in gold. His layered robe and scarf read like a Riften patriot's practical finery… until you notice the quiet Thieves Guild tells: a heavy keyring, well-placed pouches, and the controlled, alley-born way he stands. At his hip rides a strange dark-leather tome stamped with an ornate eye-like sigil; most assume 'scholar's grimoire,' but the wrong kind of scholar would recognize something far older. His belt buckle bears a silver, old-style eye/knot motif—subtle, but unmistakable to the Guild.
silhouette_notes: Deep violet hood with gold border frames the face; Altmer ears still visible—he's not hiding what he is, just controlling what you notice first.
Long, wavy black hair spills forward from the hood in curtain-like strands; face is cleanly groomed with a neat mustache and goatee.
Belt carries a heavy keyring and practical leather pouches; the buckle is a silver eye/knot motif that reads 'old Nocturnal' to anyone Guild-taught.
A dark leather tome hangs at the left hip—embossed with an ornate eye-sigil. Most read it as 'mystic scholar gear' and move on.
Carries himself like a court-trained consultant who learned survival in alleys: poised, quiet, predatory confidence.

neutral: A hooded Altmer in Riften-cut violet and gold—handsome, composed, and far too calm for someone carrying that many keys.
He looks like a local with coin until your eyes catch the belt: pouches, keyring, and a posture that belongs to back-alleys, not ballrooms.
There's a dark tome at his hip stamped with an eye-like sigil. Probably just scholar business… probably.
positive: Violet hood, steady hands, and that keyring—yeah, you look like someone who gets inside places cleanly. Riften respects that.
You carry yourself like a professional: part court, part alley. That's a rare blend—and a useful one.
You look like you belong here. Not as a tourist. As someone the city already decided to keep.
negative: An Altmer wearing Riften colors like a mask. Cute. Tell me—what are you hiding under that hood?
That keyring and those pouches scream 'Guild,' and I don't care how polite you are about it.
He's got the look of a charming problem: handsome face, quiet confidence, and the kind of eyes that measure exits.

neutral: That hip-tome… the embossed eye isn't decorative. Vaermina. Quagmire has fingerprints, even on leather.
Most would call it 'a strange grimoire.' I call it a warning: that sigil is Vaermina's, and it never shows up by accident.
positive: You're carrying Vaermina's mark in public and you're still breathing. Either you're brilliant… or favored. Either way, I'm listening.
That eye-sigil tome is the kind of secret you don't carry unless you mean it. Respect.
negative: Vaermina's eye on your hip? That's not scholarship—that's contamination. Keep your dreams away from mine.
I know that sigil. I don't care what story you tell—Vaermina is in the margins.

neutral: That buckle—old Nocturnal style. You're either Guild… or you stole the right symbol from the wrong person.
Silver eye-knot at the waist, keyring at the hip. You're not subtle to the people who matter.
positive: Nocturnal's old mark on your belt. Alright—one of ours. Keep it quiet and we'll get along.
That's Guild craftsmanship in your silhouette. You look like you've earned your shadows.
negative: That buckle tells me exactly what you are. Don't bring Guild trouble to my doorstep.
Nocturnal's mark isn't jewelry. If you're wearing it, you'd better be worth the heat.
